application

Class Dialogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Dialogs

  • public class Dialogs
extends java.lang.Object

    Dialogs

    Handles all dialog and alert windows such as information alerts, confirmation alerts as well as input dialogs for single or double inputs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dialogs()

      static void alert(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String infoText)
      Shows an information alert.
      static void alertError(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String infoText)
      Shows an error alert.
      static java.util.Optional<Bicycle> choiceDialog(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String label, java.util.Set<Bicycle> bicycle)
      Shows a multiple choice dialog with drop down selector.
      static boolean confirmDialog(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String question)
      Shows an confirmation alert with buttons "Yes" and "No".
      static java.lang.String logInDialog(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText)
      Shows a login dialog with one passwordField used for password input.

      Shows a login dialog with one input field for password.

      Shows an input dialog with one input field.
      static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> twoInputsDialog(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String[] labels)
      Shows an input dialog with two input fields.

      • alert

        public static void alert(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String headerText,
                         java.lang.String infoText)
        Shows an information alert.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the pop up window
        headerText - the string to show in the dialog header area
        infoText - the string to show in the dialog content area

                                    java.lang.String headerText,
                                    java.lang.String question)

        Parameters:
        title - the title of the pop up window
        headerText - the string to show in the dialog header area
        question - the string to show in the dialog content area
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the result

        public static java.util.Optional<Bicycle> choiceDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                                       java.lang.String headerText,

                                                       java.util.Set<Bicycle> bicycle)
        Shows a multiple choice dialog with drop down selector.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the pop up window
        headerText - The string to show in the dialog header area
        label - The strings to show in the dialog content area before the input fields
        bicycle - The bicycles to choose from
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the result
